Dont listen to my first post, ima get you some steps:
1. Download Deamon tools from thepiratebay if you dont already got it and install it.
2. Left click on the deamon icon in the "activityfield" / bottom right corner.
3 Choose a device and find the hearts of iron 2 map
4. Just doubleclick on the binfile named mx-hoi2int and the demoshield should start...

Pretty basic stuff actually, yall gotta be big time noobs...
